function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Direct contact with wastewater containing microorganisms","Impact":"Risk of contracting contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and provide appropriate personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment and disinfection technology","People":"Employees at wastewater treatment plants","Owner":"Management and government authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate supply of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for medical personnel","Mitigation":"Strategic planning for global manufacture, access, and monitoring of PPE supply chains","Technologies":"Supply chain management and monitoring technology","People":"Medical personnel, hospital staff","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Global shortage of essential medical supplies","Impact":"Risk of insufficient healthcare provision and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Strategic planning to ensure access and protection of global supply chains","Technologies":"Supply chain management and monitoring technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Global health organizations, government authorities"}]}
